title: Unable to Earn Chests
body: First post on the forums, so bear with me. I have been experiencing a problem for a while now in that I have 4 chests available to earn according to my profile overview, yet do not earn any when I or a party member achieve an S- or higher rank. Help is appreciated.

replies.body: It looks like you've earned a decent amount of chests so far this season from getting high mastery scores, nice! You might still have 4 available chests to get, but remember [**you can only get a chest once for each champion per season**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).
Ah, I was not aware of that, it seems rather arbitrary. Thanks.
